nodes.title: Importan Notes !!!
widgets_values:
> **Note:**  

This 3D "Object" workflow is recommended to run on **Medium**, **Large**or **XLarge** machines. Bigger machine types may lead to runtime errors or unstable results.  "Body" workflow works fine for all machine types.

Due to the complexity of 3D reconstruction and optimization, the "3D Object" workflow can take ** ~40 minutes or more ** to complete.

nodes.title: Importan Notes !!!
widgets_values:
> **Note**  

 If you see an alert saying **Error loading model** when opening this workflow in ComfyUI, you can safely ignore it.  

 This warning does **not** affect the functionality or execution of the workflow, and it will still run as expected.
